features: GREAT VALUE PACKAGE DEAL: 5 pack of 8GB USB 2.0 Flash Drive.
NO NEED TO INSTALL ANY SOFTWARE: just plug in and use it! windows 7 / Vista / XP / 2000 / ME / NT Linux and Mac OS, Compatible with USB2.0 and below.
GREAT FOR ALL AGES AND PURPOSES: suitable for digital data storing, transferring and sharing in school, in family, to friends, to clients, to machines. Apply to data storage of music, photos, movies,
with competitive price usb drive pack, new portable storage device, keep your digital world in your pocket in our smallest package.
We promise that any problem about the product with in 18-month warranty and friendly customer service.
body.description: Description: Capacity: 8GB Five Mixed Colors: Gold Rose Blue Purple Green Interface Type: USB 2.0 Compatible (Backwards compatible to USB 1.1) Writing speed: 4mb/s-7mb/s Reading speed : 12mb/s-18mb/s Compatibility: Desktop, Laptop, Macintosh, Tablet, Speakers all with USB port Operating System : windows 7 / 8 / 10 / Vista / XP / 2000 / ME / NT Linux and Mac OS. Operating Temperatures : 32o F to 140o F (0o C to 60o C) Storage Temperatures: -4o F to 185o F (-20o C to 85o C) with metal casing design, with transparent plastic for both ends, the cap end protect the usb interface and greatly reduce the oxidation, and the another end for the LED display. Package Included: 5pcs 8GB USB Flash Drive Friendly Tips: The actual available capacity: 7.4GB-7.5GB Some of the listed capacity on a Flash storage device is used for formatting and other functions and thus is not available for data storage. As such, the actual available capacity for data storage is less than what is listed on the products. FAT32 is factory default drive format, which is read/write compatible with Windows and Mac OS; while NTFS is compatible with Windows but semi-compatible with Mac OS. Please format it properly if need. Service: Thank you for choosing us products. If you are not happy with us products, please do not hesitate to contact us. In every customer relationship, EastFun strives to be a trusted partner and seeks to achieve 100% customer satisfaction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Product and Great Price
reviews.reviewText: Product works fine and easy to copy files on ! Used them to copy photos on from trip to Africa. 1500 photos for the three people on the trip with me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good price if you need a bunch of small drives , also NOT FAKE
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for cheap usb drives that I wouldn't use more than 4GB each on for various boot utilities, installations, and flashing of firmware.Of course there's always the problem of fake usb drives where the actual space is smaller than indicated and you simply start overwriting data if you exceed the real space.These use Chipsbanks CBM2199a which is a pretty new flash controller and the memory reported as ECD7947E64C4 - Samsung K9HDGY8U5B - 4CE/Single Channel [MLC-8K]I ran them through a 3 pass low level factory format using UMPtool and they are all really 16GB (ish). Benchmark show they are below but close enough to the performance of a Sandisk Cruzer Glide (16GB usb 2.0). However the random write performance is pretty bad. You can compensate for this with disk caching in Windows. Below are the benchmark results. Overall they are 5 stars because the price is great , they aren't fake, and the performance is mostly ok.USB Drive formatted as extfat with the default cluster allocation size of 4KBUsing a USB 3.2 gen 1 port (5gbit) AMD controller , Windows 10, latest driversBenchmark Tool Crystal Disk Mark - 1 pass 128MB fileEastfun[Read]Sequential 1MiB (Q= 8, T= 1): 20.090 MB/s [ 19.2 IOPS]Sequential 1MiB (Q= 1, T= 1): 20.106 MB/s [ 19.2 IOPS] Random 4KiB (Q= 32, T=16): 11.748 MB/s [ 2868.2 IOPS] Random 4KiB (Q= 1, T= 1): 11.418 MB/s [ 2787.6 IOPS][Write]Sequential 1MiB (Q= 8, T= 1): 5.868 MB/s [ 5.6 IOPS]Sequential 1MiB (Q= 1, T= 1): 6.690 MB/s [ 6.4 IOPS] Random 4KiB (Q= 32, T=16): 0.003 MB/s [ 0.7 IOPS] Random 4KiB (Q= 1, T= 1): 0.008 MB/s [ 2.0 IOPS]Sandisk Cruzer Glide 16GB (Usb 2.0)[Read]Sequential 1MiB (Q= 8, T= 1): 25.301 MB/s [ 24.1 IOPS]Sequential 1MiB (Q= 1, T= 1): 25.985 MB/s [ 24.8 IOPS] Random 4KiB (Q= 32, T=16): 6.950 MB/s [ 1696.8 IOPS] Random 4KiB (Q= 1, T= 1): 6.048 MB/s [ 1476.6 IOPS][Write]Sequential 1MiB (Q= 8, T= 1): 6.285 MB/s [ 6.0 IOPS]Sequential 1MiB (Q= 1, T= 1): 7.125 MB/s [ 6.8 IOPS] Random 4KiB (Q= 32, T=16): 2.950 MB/s [ 720.2 IOPS]

reviews.reviewText: Fairly sturdy little drives for a great price. Only thing I could suggest is maybe matching little connectors to go on keychains and lanyards possibly.
